key_risks: Interest rate sensitivity impacting net interest margins and loan demand
High concentration in commercial real estate (CRE) loans, representing 449% of total risk-based capital
Regulatory and compliance risks due to evolving banking regulations
Cybersecurity threats from reliance on digital banking platforms

governance_issues: Potential legal and reputational risks from merger investigation
